h1.style: margin: 1rem 0px 0.3rem; text-align: center; line-height: 1; font-size: 4rem; font-weight: bold;
h1.span: Due to COVID-19, all Open House events have been CANCELED until further notice.

h2.style: margin: 1rem 0px 0.2rem; text-align: center; line-height: 1; font-size: 2rem; font-weight: bold;
h2.span:
Additionally, K-12 schools are closed indefinitely, but staff is working remotely to address questions and concerns. Please contact the school’s front office for assistance.
We appreciate your understanding during this time!

a.class: vc_btn vc_btn_white vc_btn-white vc_btn_lg vc_btn-lg vc_btn_outlined aligncenter text-center
a.title: Virtual Learning

h1.style: margin: 3rem 0px 0.7rem; text-align: center; line-height: 1; font-size: 4rem; font-weight: bold;
h1.span: A Private School Education at a Public School Price. Now enrolling K-12 for 2020-2021!

a.class: vc_btn vc_btn_white vc_btn-white vc_btn_lg vc_btn-lg vc_btn_outlined aligncenter text-center
a.title: Online Registration

span.em: Desert Heights Charter Schools are not affiliated with Desert Heights Academy.

div.p: Committed to a quality preschool – high school education, Desert Heights is a community that “feels like family”! Review our site for program details and contact us today to schedule a tour!
We offer a variety of clubs and activities! Visit school pages for details.
Project-based learning is leveraged to develop critical thinking skills and better prepare students for identifying solutions to real-world problems.
Jr. Coyote Sports available Kindergarten-4th grade and a championship athletic program 5th-12th. YOTES UP!
As a 501(c)(3) non-profit corporation, all contributions are fully tax-deductible as allowed by law (Tax ID #91-2184875). MORE…
As students progress through our program, there’s more and more emphasis on college and career readiness. MORE…

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_double vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_sep_color_grey vc_separator-has-text

div.p: Enrolling now! Contact us today to schedule a tour.

p.br:
2 Yrs – Pre-Kindergarten
5821 West Beverly Lane
Glendale, AZ 85306

Kindergarten – 4th Grade
5821 West Beverly Lane
Glendale, AZ 85306

5th-12th Grade
3540 W Union Hills Drive
Glendale, AZ 85308

div.p: In accordance with A.R.S. §15-903(E), as amended by Laws 2018, Ch. 285, §10, below are average teacher salaries for Desert Heights Charter Schools.

ul.li: Average salary of all teachers employed in budget year 2019 = $35,358
Average salary of all teachers employed in budget year 2018 = $32,806
Increase in average teacher salary from the prior year 2018 = $2,552
